Package index

All functions

assemble_carmon_obj()
Assemble an object of class carmon_cop and one of class carmon_rec into a carmon object
carmon()
Perform copula-aided reconstruction, analysis and plot of a multi-omics network
centrality_report()
Display the table of results of the consensus centrality analysis of the carmon network
compute_centrality()
Find key nodes in a carmon network
copulize()
Use copulas to transfer all omics layers to the normal realm
get_network()
Extract a carmon network
multi_omics multi_omics_small multi_omics_micro
Multi-omics dataset of sleep deprivation in mouse
plot(<carmon>)
Plot carmon networks
plot_report()
Plot the results of the node centrality analysis
reconstruct()
Reconstruct a multi-omics network from a list of copulized layers
which_marginals()
Print the marginal distributions currently implemented inside carmon
which_omics()
Print the omics types for which carmon is tailored on
